node.title: Bushland razed, locals flee as fires rage through Yallingup and Margaret River wine region
node.alt: Ominous sky over Margaret River paddock
node.description: More than 3,000 hectares of bushland are razed as two massive fires threaten lives and properties in Western Australia's most famous wine and surfing region.
node.content:
["More than 3,000 hectares of bushland have been razed by\u00a0two massive fires threatening lives and properties in Western Australia's most famous wine and surfing region.", "The fires, which are being fanned by strong winds and are\u00a0both at emergency level, are in the Leeuwin-Naturaliste National Park near Margaret River, and\u00a0in the Yallingup region.", "The emergency warning for the fire near Margaret River covers part of the\u00a0Leeuwin-Naturaliste National Park in the shire of Augusta Margaret River\u00a0bounded by Redgate Road, Bussell Highway, Chapman Road, Hamelin Bay Road West and the coastline.", "The Yallingup fire emergency warning covers\u00a0an area west of Caves Road between Spencer Road and Johnson Road, including Quininup Road, Tilly Road and separate parts of the Leeuwin-Naturaliste National Park in the shire of Busselton.", "", "
The fire has been blazing in the Boranup forest near Margaret River.(ABC News: James Carmody)
", "That fire, which was reported around 9am, is neither contained nor controlled and is moving fast in a south-westerly direction.", "The fire to the south of Margaret River is also out of control and not contained.", "People in both areas are warned they need to act immediately to survive.", "
Leeuwin fire 'extremely serious'
", "WA Department of Fire and Emergency Services (DFES) Commissioner Darren Klemm said the Leeuwin fire near Margaret River\u00a0was particularly concerning.", "\"The fire in the Leeuwin-Naturaliste National Park is moving fast in multiple directions, it is uncontrolled and uncontained,\" he said.", "", "
DFES Commissioner Darren Klemm says people should reconsider any\u00a0weekend holiday plans in the affected regions.(ABC News: Rebecca Trigger)
", "\"The situation in this area is extremely serious. A number of properties are under threat on or about Caves Road.", "\"The safest option for people in this area is always to leave early, don't wait.\"", "No property has been damaged and no firefighters have been injured.", "An evacuation centre has been set up at the Margaret River Recreation Centre in Wallcliffe Road.", "
Farmer says fire 'ferocious'
", "Ross Woodhouse,\u00a0a dairy farmer in Warner Glen, east of the blaze, said he had been watching the huge fire front.\u00a0", "\"It's extensive. It looks to be 10 kilometres\u00a0from one end to the other and you can see a red tinge as well, so it's a pretty ferocious fire,\" he said.", "", "
A local watches smoke billow over the ridges near Margaret River from\u00a0Grunters Beach.(ABC News: Jessica Warriner)
", "He said he was busy preparing his property in case the blaze spread.", "\"We're a bit fearful that if it jumps Bussell Highway, it will be red alert for us because there are bush areas that have not been burnt for 30 years between us and Bussell Highway.", "\"There is complacency amongst lots of people you speak to, but for us, with the area that we have got to protect and the animals that we have got to protect and what's at stake, we have got systems in place.\"", "
Couple flee Yallingup with pets
", "Fletcher Carney and Zoe Haisma evacuated with their dog Maple and cat Ziggy as the\u00a0emergency-level blaze took hold of the national park near their home, which is in the Yallingup region.\u00a0", "They watched from their car as plumes of smoke billowed from the park.\u00a0", "", "
Zoe Haisma had to flee her home near Yallingup, with her dog Maple and cat Ziggy, as the bushfire approached.\u00a0(ABC News: James Carmody)
", "\"I grabbed all my surfboards, the pets, personal stuff, photos,\" Mr Fletcher said.\u00a0", "\"We left the big things. If it goes, we can replace it.\"", "The pair were unsure where they would spend\u00a0the night, but said they had a number of friends locally\u00a0and the community had already stepped up.\u00a0", "\"There's lots of posts on the community pages of people offering housing,\" Ms Haisma said.\u00a0", "", "
Staff at the Karridale roadhouse closed the business early on Thursday because of the encroaching bushfire.(Facebook: Karridale\u00a0Roadhouse)
", "Air support is on the scene of both blazes, which are expected to continue overnight.\u00a0", "A number of wineries in the area are believed to have been evacuated.", "Wineries and other tourist attractions in the region include House of Cards, Arimia Estate, the Yallingup Maze and the Gabriel chocolate factory.", "A number of roads have been closed, including Caves Road from the Redgate Road intersection to Boranup Drive in the south, and Forest Grove to the east.", "", "
The Margaret River blaze was reported on Wednesday and firefighters spent the night battling it.(Supplied: Mr Barval Fine Wines (Facebook))
", "The national park and\u00a0campgrounds including Conto, Point Road and Boranup\u00a0have been shut.", "Tourist attractions, including Calgardup Cave and Giants Cave, have also been closed for the second day in a row.", "Watch and act and advice-level warnings have also been issued for the neighbouring areas of both fires, covering areas including Witchcliffe, Hamelin Bay and Wilyabrup.", "", "
Firefighters have been battling an out-of-control blaze near Margaret River for two days.(Supplies:\u00a0DFES Incident Photographer Sean Blocksidge)
", "The Yallingup fire broke out in a house on Tilly Road about 9am\u00a0and spread to surrounding bushland.", "People are being warned that embers could fly\u00a0 towards their houses and gusty winds are producing flames of up to one metre.", "Busselton Mayor Grant Henley said it was a difficult situation for firefighters.", "\"We have had a couple of hot days and you know our volunteers have been out in support of the Boranup fires now for 24 hours and then those that aren't on fatigue management are coming back and fighting a fire in their own patch,\" he said."]
